thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-IGM Financial Announces February 2018 Investment Fund Sales And Total Assets Under Management

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IGM Financial Announces February 2018 Investment Fund Sales And Total Assets Under Management
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - IGM Financial Inc:
* IGM FINANCIAL INC. ANNOUNCES FEBRUARY 2018 INVESTMENT FUND SALES AND TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT
* IGM FINANCIAL - ‍TOTAL AUM WERE $156.4 BILLION AT FEBRUARY 28, 2018, COMPARED WITH $157.5 BILLION AT JANUARY 31, 2018 AND $146.0 BILLION AT FEBRUARY 28, 2017​
* IGM FINANCIAL INC - INVESTMENT FUND AUM WERE $149.7 BILLION AT FEBRUARY 28, 2018, COMPARED WITH $150.8 BILLION AT JANUARY 31, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
